data.comment: The match has started.
Can Sendai get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Shimizu's half?
In the minute 1, Sendai are too eager and fall into an offside trap.
Sendai awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in for Shimizu in their own half.
In the minute 3, Throw-in Shimizu.
Ball safe as Sendai is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Shimizu drive upfield and Shota Kaneko gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Sendai defender.
In the minute 7, Throw-in for Shimizu at IAI Stadium Nihondaira.
Throw-in for Sendai in the half of Shimizu.
In Shizuoka a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 8, Ball safe as Sendai is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in Sendai.
Sendai awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 11, Throw-in for Shimizu in their own half.
Corner awarded to Sendai.
Sendai to take a throw-in in Shimizu territory.
In the minute 13, Ball goes out of play for a Shimizu goal kick.
Shimizu takes a corner from the left.
Throw-in for Shimizu at IAI Stadium Nihondaira.
In the minute 16, Takayoshi Ishihara (Sendai) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Sendai move into a 0-1 lead through a Koji Hachisuka header.
Yoshiki Matsushita instrumental with a fine assist.
In the minute 18, Free kick for Sendai in the half of Shimizu.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Shizuoka.
Sendai pushes forward through Isaac Cuenca, whose finish on goal is saved.
In the minute 24, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Sendai to take a throw-in in Shimizu territory.
Sendai have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 26, Shimizu awarded a free kick in their own half.
Goal! Kenta Nishizawa equalizes to bring the score to 1-1.
Great play from Shota Kaneko to set up the goal.
In the minute 30, Sendai awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Free kick for Sendai in their own half.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 32, Corner awarded to Sendai.
Sendai takes a corner from the right.
Shimizu drive forward but Yuito Suzuki is judged offside.
In the minute 34, Free kick in a good position for Sendai!
Sendai are coming forward and Yoshiki Matsushita gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Goal kick for Shimizu at IAI Stadium Nihondaira.
In the minute 39, Throw-in for Sendai in their own half.
Throw-in for Shimizu in the half of Sendai.
Ball safe as Sendai is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 40, Throw-in for Sendai at IAI Stadium Nihondaira.
Sendai have a goal kick.
Can Shimizu get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Sendai's half?
The 1st half is prolonged by 1 minutes of added time.
In the minute 45, Can Shimizu get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Sendai's half?
2 minutes will be added to the 1st half.
The whistle has gone to end the first-half.
In the minute 45, Goal! Yoshiki Matsushita gives Sendai a 1-2 lead.
Keiya Shiihashi with an assist there.
In the minute 46, The second-half has just kicked-off.
Ball goes out of play for a Sendai goal kick.
In the minute 46, Sendai to take a throw-in in Shimizu territory.
Shimizu make their first substitution with Keita Nakamura replacing Shota Kaneko.
Yosuke Kawai is replacing Kota Miyamoto for the home team.
In the minute 46, The home team replace Yuito Suzuki with Junior Dutra.
Takuma Nishimura is on a sub for Shun Nagasawa for Sendai.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Free kick Shimizu.
In the minute 49, Kenta Nishizawa of Shimizu gets in a strike, but is off target.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Shizuoka.
Throw-in for Shimizu in the half of Sendai.
In the minute 51, Throw-in for Shimizu in the half of Sendai.
Throw-in Sendai.
Shimizu needs to be cautious. Sendai have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 54, Throw-in for Shimizu in their own half.
Ryo Takeuchi (Shimizu) gets in a powerful header but the ball is cleared away.
Sendai have a goal kick.
In the minute 59, Throw-in for Shimizu at IAI Stadium Nihondaira.
Throw-in Shimizu.
Free kick for Shimizu in their own half.
In the minute 64, Kunimitsu Sekiguchi is on a sub for Isaac Cuenca for Sendai.
Shimizu are pushing forward but Keita Nakamura's finish is wide of the goal.
Goal kick for Sendai at IAI Stadium Nihondaira.
In the minute 66, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Goal! The home team draw level at 2-2 through a header from Junior Dutra.
That's a fine assist from Hwang Seok-Ho.
In the minute 69, Sendai make their third substitution with Takahiro Yanagi replacing Yasuhiro Hiraoka.
Sendai awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick for Shimizu in the half of Sendai.
In the minute 71, In Shizuoka a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Throw-in high up the field for Sendai in Shizuoka.
Shimizu awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 75, Corner awarded to Sendai.
Ball safe as Shimizu is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Keita Nakamura is booked for the home team.
In the minute 76, Kunimitsu Sekiguchi (Sendai) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Takuma Hamasaki is replacing Takayoshi Ishihara for the away team.
The away team replace Hiroto Yamada with Alexandre Guedes.
In the minute 79, Free kick for Shimizu in their own half.
Takuma Hamasaki (Sendai) gets a yellow card.
Shimizu awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 81, Free kick Shimizu.
Takuma Nishimura (Sendai) has received a first yellow card.
Yasufumi Nishimura is on a sub for Yusuke Goto for Shimizu.
In the minute 83, Shimizu are whistled for offside.
Throw-in for Shimizu in their own half.
Shimizu awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 84, Ball safe as Sendai is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Sendai take a 2-3 lead thanks to Takuma Hamasaki.
Shimizu make their fifth substitution with Kazunori Yoshimoto replacing Kenta Nishizawa.
The fourth official's board shows 5 minutes, which will be added to the 2nd half.
Free kick for Sendai in the half of Shimizu.
Can Sendai get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Shimizu's half?
Ball goes out of play for a Shimizu goal kick.
Throw-in for Shimizu at IAI Stadium Nihondaira.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Shizuoka.
Free kick for Sendai in their own half.
Throw-in Sendai.
The match is over. Final score 2-3.
Jakub Slowik is booked for the away team.
